data.prayer: Jesus, please help the 4,533 believers in the state of Kassala to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kassala, Sudan
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Kassala, Sudan. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Kassala, Sudan. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.prayer: Lord, to the people of Kassala you say, "If you wait for Me, I will work on your behalf."
data.verse: For from of old men have not heard, nor perceived by the ear, neither has the eye seen a God besides you, who works for him who waits for him.

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Shukria people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Kassala, Sudan.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Kassala, Sudan.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.section_summary:
the state of Kassala, Sudan has a population of 1,171,100.

We estimate Kassala has 4,533 people who might know Jesus, 53,849 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,112,718 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 258 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, put your Bible in the hands of the 1,112,718, who are far from you and live in this place.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your Word. I seek you with all my heart; do not let me stray from your commands.
